definition: sand grains accumulate to make a tower a tower (idiom); by gathering small amounts one gets a huge quantity/many a mickle makes a muckle

sentences.english: Gathering together the parts for such non-popular baked goods.

sentences.english: The theme of innovation award is "every little helps a mickle, innovation breakthrough".

definition: many hairs make a fur coat (idiom); many small contributions add up to sth big/many a mickle makes a muckle

to accumulate over a long period of time
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
